about_the_game:
Postlife is an exploration-based RPG where you traverse a mysterious mansion in search of your missing sister.

Experience a strange micro society inside the walls of the Afterafter life! A mystifying existence between life and death!

The strange inhabitants of this mansion seem to be obsessed with getting high through whatever means necessary, surely Wade will keep sober! Right?

Will Wade find her missing sister? Or will she be trapped in purgatory forever!?



  • Hand drawn Character Sprites!
  • Special Character Dialogue for being Sober or High!
  • Special rooms that change entirely if you are High!
  • Multiple Endings!



All this stress can be overwhelming! Why not take a load off explore with a mellow mind?

Explore the entire Afterafter life while you're High! Wade has unique responses to any and everything while she's wasted!

Change the outcome of your journey with one simple hit!

content_descriptors.notes: PostLife has... comedic use of drugs, swearing, unrealistic depictions of blood, mention of self harm...
